main event: On the evening of September 6, 1959, Private First Class Gene Snyder noticed a bright, hovering light in the sky while on patrol in Wallingford, Kentucky.
interesting points: The light was observed at approximately 8:15 PM and was seen pulsating while hovering,The light then moved slowly in a northwesterly direction while increasing in size and brightness,Multiple witnesses reported seeing similar bright lights in the area,One of the witnesses described the object as circular in shape and reddish-orange,The incident was filed as part of Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright, hovering light in the sky
witness description: Private First Class Gene Snyder and Mr. Gus Harrington, who described the object as circular and glowing with reddish-orange color.
